name: The Gate of Trials
description: The gate that leads to the holy grail is locked! The path to the Chimera's Grotto has opened to the east.

npc.name: Wizard
npc.description: A spooky wizard who's willing to talk something.
npc.tip: The adventurer can try to talk for possible helpful tips of winning the game.

action.look: Try to talk to him and see what he has to say...
action.talk: It's dangerous to go alone! Look for a weapon!

name: Chimera's Grotto Entrance
description: You're in the entrance of the grotto. You should find something to defend yourself with...

name: Armory
description: You hear monsterous screams deep in the dungeon...

action.look: A melee weapon found in the Armory Room, used for attacking enemies.

name: Goblin's Lair
description: You see a mob of goblin's getting ready to attack you!

name: Sanctuary
description: You find a room filled with various potions that could aid you in your journey

name: Key Room
description: You come across a room with a shiny key on a pedestal. However, as soon as you grab it, the room starts filling with poisonous gas!

action.get: You got a key! Use it to unlock a door in this dungeon.

name: Goblin's Game Room
description: You enter a room filled with riddles, but beware, each wrong answer triggers a trap!

name: Boss Room
description: Congratulations! You've reached the final challenge. A fierce Chimera stands between you and a piece of the holy grail. Defeat it to claim your prize!

npc.name: Chimera
npc.description: A monstrous creature with the head of a lion, body of a goat, tail of a serpent, and has deadly breath of fire.
npc.tip: The adventurer must stay focus and use every trick to defeat this fearsome foe and claim the ultimate prize

action.look: Try to talk to Chimera and see what she has to say!
action.talk: Pretty (well tiny bit) impressed that you made it up here. Good luck passing me through hahahaha.

name: Grotto Treasure Room
description: You've found the first piece of the Trial Key!

action.look: It's the first key we need to get the Holy Grail!
